Cufy

Privacy Policy

Your privacy is fundamental to everything we do. Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information on Cufy.

Last updated: November 20, 2024

Our Commitment to Your Privacy

At Cufy, we understand that privacy is personal. As a platform designed exclusively for college students, we take extra care to protect your information and maintain the trust you place in us.

This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your personal information when you use our dating platform. By using Cufy, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

Quick Summary
  • • We only collect information necessary to provide our services
  • • Your messages are encrypted and private
  • • We never sell your personal information
  • • You have full control over your data and privacy settings
  • • College verification ensures a safe, student-only community

Information We Collect

Account Information

  • College email address for verification
  • Name, age, and basic profile information
  • Photos you choose to upload
  • Bio and interests you provide
  • Location and college information

Usage Information

  • App usage patterns and features used
  • Messages sent and received (encrypted)
  • Matches and likes you give/receive
  • Device information and IP address
  • Log data and crash reports

Optional Information

  • Social media profiles you choose to link
  • Additional photos and verification images
  • Preferences and dating criteria
  • Feedback and survey responses

How We Use Your Information

Core Services

  • Create and maintain your profile
  • Match you with compatible users
  • Enable messaging and communication
  • Verify college student status
  • Provide customer support

Safety & Security

  • Detect and prevent fraud or abuse
  • Enforce our community guidelines
  • Investigate safety reports
  • Maintain platform security
  • Age and identity verification

Improvements

  • Analyze usage to improve features
  • Personalize your experience
  • Develop new services and features
  • Conduct research and analytics
  • Test new functionalities

Information Sharing

What We Share

  • Profile information with potential matches
  • Public information you choose to display
  • Messages with intended recipients only
  • Anonymous usage data for research
  • Legal compliance when required

What We Never Share

  • Your personal contact information
  • Private messages with third parties
  • Financial or payment information
  • Unencrypted personal data
  • Information for marketing by others

Service Providers

  • Cloud storage and hosting services
  • Analytics and crash reporting tools
  • Payment processing (if applicable)
  • Customer support platforms
  • Security and fraud prevention services

Data Security

Protection Measures

  • End-to-end encryption for messages
  • Secure HTTPS connections
  • Regular security audits and updates
  • Access controls and authentication
  • Data backup and recovery systems

Account Security

  • College email verification required
  • Photo verification for authenticity
  • Suspicious activity monitoring
  • Account recovery procedures
  • Regular password security checks

Data Storage

  • Secure cloud infrastructure
  • Geographic data localization
  • Regular data backups
  • Retention period limits
  • Secure deletion procedures

Your Rights and Choices

Privacy Controls

  • Control who can see your profile
  • Manage photo visibility settings
  • Block or report other users
  • Control location sharing
  • Manage notification preferences

Data Rights

  • Access your personal data
  • Correct inaccurate information
  • Delete your account and data
  • Download your data
  • Restrict data processing

Communication Preferences

  • Opt out of marketing emails
  • Control push notifications
  • Manage match notifications
  • Set message preferences
  • Choose communication channels

Questions About Your Privacy?

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, we're here to help.

Contact Privacy Teamprivacy@cufy.in

Important Information

Policy Updates

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We'll notify you of any significant changes through the app or email.

Age Requirement

Cufy is only available to users who are 18 years or older and currently enrolled in college.

International Users

If you use Cufy from outside India, your information may be transferred to and processed in India.

Third-Party Links

Our app may contain links to third-party websites. This Privacy Policy does not apply to those sites.
